h1_title: The Four Heavenly Kings and Erlang Shen
h2_title: The Four Heavenly Kings Boss Fight and Guide
content: Thankfully after a huge battle against Erlang, The Sacred Divinity, the fight against the Four Heavenly Kings is much more straightforward. They share one health bar between them, and in your Stone Monkey transformation, you can use Primal Punch as your light attack, Earthshatter Slam as your heavy attack (this attack also heals), and Rock Solid to deflect their hits.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Four_Heavenly_Kings_and_Erlang_Shen.md', within the main section titled 'The Four Heavenly Kings and Erlang Shen', specifically from the subsection 'The Four Heavenly Kings Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Thankfully after a huge battle against Erlang, The Sacred Divinity, the fight against the Four Heavenly Kings is much more straightforward. They share one health bar between them, and in your Stone Monkey transformation, you can use Primal Punch as your light attack, Earthshatter Slam as your heavy attack (this attack also heals), and Rock Solid to deflect their hits.
